name: 蕭名宏
objective:
先修課程:4403053或負責教授同意
向量微積分，傅立葉級數與邊界值問題，偏微分方程。
schedule:
週次1至２：Systems of Linear Differential Equations
週次３至５：Vector Differential Calculus
週次７至１０：Vector Integral Calculus
週次1１至１２：Fourier Series
週次1３至１４：The Fourier Integral and Fourier Transforms
週次1５：Partial Differential Equations
週次1６：The Wave Equation
週次1７：The Heat Equation
scorePolicy: 作業２０％，課堂表現１０％，期中考兩次各２０％，期末考３０％
materials: Advanced Engineering Mathematics, by Peter V. O’Neil, 第六版, 新月書局
